rule_name.description:
Description

Checks for long lines.


Rationale: Long lines are hard to read in printouts or if developers
have limited screen space for the source code, e.g. if the IDE
displays additional information like project tree, class hierarchy,
etc.
rule_name.option:
fileExtensions, Specify the file extensions of the files to process., String[], all files
ignorePattern, Specify pattern for lines to ignore., Pattern, "^(package|import) .*"
max, Specify the maximum line length allowed., int, 80
